old


insert into stadium (build_date, city, land, name, plz, street_and_number, visitor_limit, version)
values ('1994-8-18', 'Chicago', 'USA', 'United Center', '60612','1901 W Madison St', '21711', 0),
			('2008-09-10','Berlin', 'Deutschland', 'Mercedes-Benz Arena','10243', 'Mercedes-Platz 1', '14500',0);
			
insert into league (name, land, version)
values ('NBA', 'USA', 0),
		('BBA', 'Deutschland', 0);

insert into team (name, hometown, start_date, mascot, stadium_id, league_id,version)
values('Chicago Bulls', 'Chicago','1966-01-01', 'Benny the Bull', '1', '1',0),
		('Alba Berlin', 'Berlin','1991-01-01', 'Albatros', '2', '2', 0);

insert into player (first_name, last_name, day_of_birth, market_value, player_number, height, weight, position, team_id, version)
values('Jerian', 'Grant', '1992-10-09','1700000', '2', '193','90', 'Guard','1',0),
		('Peyton', 'Siva', '1990-10-24','700000', '7', '182', '82', 'Guard', '2',0);





select * from stadium;
select * from league; 
select * from team; 
select * from player;

new 


insert into stadium (build_date, city, land, name, plz, street_and_number, visitor_limit, version)
values ('1994-8-18', 'Chicago', 'USA', 'United Center', '60612','1901 W Madison St', '21711', 0),
			('2008-09-10','Berlin', 'Deutschland', 'Mercedes-Benz Arena','10243', 'Mercedes-Platz 1', '14500',0);
			
			
insert into league (name, full_name, land, team_count, foundation_year, version)
values ('NBA','National Basketball Association', 'USA', '30', '1946', 0),
		('BBL','easyCredit Baskeball-Bundesliga', 'Deutschland','18', '1966', 0);

insert into team (name, hometown, start_date, mascot, stadium_id, league_id,version)
values('Chicago Bulls', 'Chicago','1966-01-01', 'Benny the Bull', '1', '1',0),
		('Alba Berlin', 'Berlin','1991-01-01', 'Albatros', '2', '2', 0);
		
		
insert into player (first_name, last_name, day_of_birth, market_value, player_number, height, position, team_id, version)
values('Jerian', 'Grant', '1992-10-09','1700000', '2', '193','Guard','1',0),
		('Peyton', 'Siva', '1990-10-24','700000', '7', '182','Guard', '2',0);
